<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get warning pix devolution by ID.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/pix/warning-pix-devolution/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Enter the warning pix devolution's ID below and execute to get its state and all information.

## Request

All requisitions must have an identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>
